headline: Barclays Reiterates Buy Rating on Adobe (ADBE)
summary: On May 16, Barclays analyst Saket Kalia reiterated a Buy rating on Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) with a $567 price target as the company is set to introduce its new pricing tiers for its Creative Cloud offerings. The analyst sees Adobe’s strategic price adjustments to positively impact its revenue streams, which are already factored into the […]

headline: Adobe Jumps 19% in a Month: Is There Any Momentum Left in the Stock?
summary: ADBE's performance is expected to remain subdued in the near term due to stiff competition and stretched valuation despite an innovative AI-powered portfolio.
